page.title: 07PLAYGROUND GAMES:PARKGATE
page.content:
{RED ROVER There are{two teams.}Each team holds hands and stands opposite to each other. One team says,{"Red Rover Red {Rover send over}Sally"(or who ever they want). The person{runs}over and tries to{break through}the{linked {arms.}If you{break}through the arms you take over whoever you want back to your team. If you do{not}break through the line of{hands}you stay on that side. The game{continues}until every- body is on one side.
{THREE AND IN In the game Three and In, you have a {football}and{three people.}One of them is a{goalkeeper}and the other two have to tackle each other and try to {score.}When the person has scored {three goals}he's in goal. The game can go on as{long as you like.
